comments.content:
Franz, I think you nailed it.   
   
Anybody tell you you're very good at this? You make me look like a slacker. :-)

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20051128221843im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/uhoh.gif)   
   
Thanks, but you must be confusing me.. I'm just the newbie!   
   
I can't believe one of the godfathers of type ID said that.. I'm not worthy, I'm not worthy!
